main event: A civilian reported sighting a bright, oval object in the sky over Chicago on April 26, 1951.
interesting points: The object was described as being bright and oval in shape., The sighting lasted approximately 30 seconds., The object was observed flying at a level altitude., The witness stated that the object moved swiftly out of sight after hovering., The report was documented in a Project Blue Book record card.
witness description: a civilian driving south on Shore and 33rd St.
